explains: n. 观点，看法；视角，观察点

sentences.en: She will have her own viewpoint on the matter.
sentences.cn: 她对这个问题会有她自己的看法。

sentences.en: You have to know where to stand for a good viewpoint.
sentences.cn: 你得知道站在哪儿才会有好的视角。

sentences.en: From a practical viewpoint, I'd advise you not to go.
sentences.cn: 从实际角度考虑，我劝你不要去。
